name: Prego Wars
description: fast paced ridiculous first person shooter deathmatch; 2024

sections.THE GAME: Prego Wars will be a fast paced, character based, first person shooter, deathmach (in that order). It's been a passion project that I've been working with my friends for the past 2 years (on-and-off), bringing tons of new skills to the table and forcing me to seriously plan my work out.
sections.CHARACTERS: Featuring the first wave of 8 characters that will be in the game on launch: Zipdip, Plasma, Salty, Luke (me), Onyx, Yucky, Checken, and Preston. They are all actual real life models I put together with PIFuHD and given the most ridiculous abilities and weapons we could think of. More news to come.
sections.STEAM: The game will be on Steam for $5-$10 USD <s>some time early 2023 some time in 2024</s> late 2025. It will run on full peer-to-peer with friends and will include 32 achievements, tons of match mutators, gamemodes, and more.
